snippet: No one seems to be talking about the defending N.F.L. champion Giants at all as they prepare for Wednesday’s season opener, which is business as usual for them.
abstract: NFL Preview; no one seems to be talking about the defending champion New York Giants as they prepare for the season opener, which is business as usual for them.
lead_paragraph: No one seems to be talking about the defending N.F.L. champion Giants at all as they prepare for Wednesday’s season opener, which is business as usual for them.

headline.seo: No One Seems to Be Talking About Super Bowl Champion Giants
